      • getDrawLine

        public abstract byte[] getDrawLine(int x0,
                                   int y0,
                                   int x1,
                                   int y1,
                                   int lineWidth)
        For TSC, CPCL, ZPL
        Draw a line.[only support Horizontal lines and straight lines].
        Parameters:
        x0 - start coordinate-x
        y0 - start coordinate-y
        x1 - end coordinate-x
        y1 - end coordinate-y
        lineWidth - line width in Dot.
        Returns:

      • getDrawBox

        public abstract byte[] getDrawBox(int x0,
                                  int y0,
                                  int x1,
                                  int y1,
                                  int lineWidth)
        Draw Box.[For TSC, CPCL, ZPL]
        Parameters:
        x0 - left-top of box coordinate-x
        y0 - left-top of box coordinate-y
        x1 - right-bottom of box coordinate-x
        y1 - right-bottom of box coordinate-y
        lineWidth - the line width of box, in dot.
        Returns:

      • getOpenMoneyBoxCmd

        public byte[] getOpenMoneyBoxCmd(byte DrawerNumber,
                                 byte PulseStartTime,
                                 byte PulseEndTime)
        打开钱箱,发送一个脉冲到指定的连接引脚。
        Parameters:
        DrawerNumber - m=0,1,48,49 m =0/48 脉冲发送到钱箱输出引脚2； m=1/49 脉冲发送到钱箱输出引脚5。
        PulseStartTime - 开机时间= t1 x 2 millisecond, 0 <= t1 <=255
        PulseEndTime - 关机时间= t2 x 2 millisecond, 0 <= t1 <=255
